Text.val: 14.02.2014 SH SCR18677 Added storage of rows to INTR/ICRT, extended TINT updates and added BSP150.PI.INTR_NO
14.08.2012 GB SCR17510 Repliced const percentange 62,5 % by the GSET_PERCENTAGE(362)
14.07.2011 SH SCR16619 Changed multiply NFIN amounts with 0,75 to 0,625
14.04.2011 JOH SCR16366 Replaced GB002 bg GB902
08.02.2010 SH SCR15287 Added task to multiply NFIN amounts with 0,75 for
14.08.2008 SH SCR13766 Uses now BSP150 to submit BSP150 instead of BSP150NEW
14.11.2007 SH SCR13092 Changed logic of program (removed handling TINS)
-- Multiply NFIN amounts with 0,625, amounts have to be decreased
-- Fetch unique numbers for futher use

SQL_STMT_U.val: select NFIN_INVCURRENCY, cast(sum(NFIN_INVAMOUNTI) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 group by NFIN_INVCURRENCY order by NFIN_INVCURRENCY for fetch only
select count(*) from :1/NFIN where NFIN_ADMNO = :2 and NFIN_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only
